name: Private Investigator
description: You were searching for some clues that the client asked for when the Cataclysm struck.  Now that client is dead.  Everyone's dead.

name: Pistol Hunter
description: Ever since you were a child you loved hunting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of hunting with a pistol.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty pistol.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.

name: Revolver Hunter
description: Ever since you were a child you loved hunting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of hunting with a revolver.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty pistol.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.

name: Double Barrel Shotgun Hunter
description: Ever since you were a child you loved hunting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of hunting with a shotgun.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty shotgun.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.

name: Small Game Rifle Hunter
description: Ever since you were a child you loved hunting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of hunting with a rifle.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty rifle.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.

name: Elephant Gun Hunter
description: Ever since you were a child you loved hunting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of hunting with a rifle.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty rifle.  So when it did, you made sure to bring the most expensive one along.

name: Air Rifle Hunter
description: Ever since you were a child you loved hunting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of hunting with a rifle.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty rifle.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.

name: Hunter with a Dog
description: Ever since you were a child you loved hunting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of hunting with a rifle.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty rifle.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.  And your not-so-little friend too.

name: Bank Robber - Crew Chief
description: The Crew Chief, also known as the Caporegime, is the head of a branch of an organized crime syndicate.  The Crew Chief commands a crew of soldiers and reports directly to a boss or an underboss.  When the crime syndicate needs to have someone dealt with, the Crew Chief and his soldiers make sure it's done.

name: Bank Robber - Armorer
description: The Armorer was formerly a profession within the military.  The armorer's job is to maintain, repair and improve armors.  Any self-respecting crime syndicate needs someone who can make sure the soldiers have the necessary protection to do their jobs.

name: Bank Robber - Muscle
description: The Muscle is a tough guy who uses violence to send messages from his Mafia superiors.  They are the backbone of any criminal organization.  The muscle is called in whenever you need to rough someone up, break some legs, crush a skull or remind people who's boss.

name: Bank Robber - Crook
description: The Crook is a versatile criminal.  The term is as old as crime itself.  Truly, the crook is a jack of all trades and a master of none.  He steals, lies, cheats and does any and every dishonest or illegal work necessary to get by.

name: Bank Robber - Rogue
description: The Rogue is a stealthy criminal, capable of sneaky tricks and deadly force.  Versatile and deceptive, the Rogue is hired to do anything from pickpocketing, to burglaries and con jobs.  The trademark of a Rogue is his versatility - what he lacks in strength he makes up for in skill.

name: Bank Robber - Burglar
description: The natural dexterity of the Burglar has benefits beyond merely breaking and entering.  Being nimble allows the Burglar to pick locks, bag bodies and answer pagers faster.  They are also harder to hit in combat.  They stay alive by staying out of the way.  This physical conditioning also gives the Burglar a high tolerance to pain and the ability to shrug off wounds quickly.

name: Bank Robber - Infiltrator
description: The Infiltrator is an agent hired by a government or large criminal organization to obtain information about its enemies, or by a corporation to obtain industrial secrets from its competitors.  The Infiltrator is a close combat specialist who knows how to use the environment in order to get the upper hand.

name: Bank Robber - Sociopath
description: The Sociopath is known to be one of the most effective type of criminals.  Where he is effective, he is also difficult to deal with, which is why larger organizations avoid him.  Bold, disinhibitted and mean, the Sociopath excels in the most violent of jobs.  Unable to feel guilt for the crimes he commits, the Sociopath is a dangerous enemy.

name: Bank Robber - Gambler
description: Heading into the furnace of battle requires skill, hardness and more than a little luck.  Some people just have it.  Luck is an elusive quality.  The ancient Greeks believed it was the design of the Gods.  It isn't.  It certainly exists, but it's something you can earn.  It requires preparation and forethought to get your pieces in place, and maximizes your chances of a return.  It's counting cards, rather than the blessing of Fortuna.

name: Bank Robber - Grinder
description: A typical grinder is a hard working individual, able to take control of difficult situations and turn them around.  The grinder relies heavily on always being in the front and dishing out punishment, being able to survive due to the fact that he does damage to the enemies regardless of how much damage he has sustained.

name: Bank Robber - Yakuza
description: The Yakuza are one of the most feared crime syndicates in the world.  Ruled by the ninkyo and lead by the Oyabun, the Yakuza are known for their strict code of conduct, organized nature and the tattoos that cover their entire bodies.  An outcast and a dropout from society, the Yakuza knows how it is to fend for himself.  While he appears gentle, he is not to be taken lightly.

name: Bank Robber - Sicario
description: The Sicario is a must in every drug cartel.  Someone who takes care of all types of problems in a most lethal way.  The Sicario never ducks out of a fight, they get the job done - without hesitation or fear.

name: Bank Robber - Sniper
description: As a sniper, you covered your team by sniping cops that tried or did, harmed your team.  Now that all of your teammates are dead, you have to write your own version of the lone survivor.

name: Bank Robber - Wheelman, Van
description: You specialized in high-stakes getaways, expertly navigating urban landscapes and escaping law enforcement with unparalleled skill behind the wheel of an escape van.  With nerves of steel and a deep understanding of your powerful vehicle, you ensures the crew's swift and safe escape from any heist or dangerous situations.  Now that your crewmates are all dead, your vehicle and your skill is all that you could belive in.

name: Bank Robber - Wheelman, Car
description: You specialized in high-stakes getaways, expertly navigating urban landscapes and escaping law enforcement with unparalleled skill behind the wheel of a roaring car.  With nerves of steel and a deep understanding of your fast vehicle, you ensures the crew's swift and safe escape from any heist or dangerous situations.  Now that your crewmates are all dead, your vehicle and your skill is all that you could belive in.

name: Old Veteran
//: Got this from a cdda profession.
description: You've been through hell once before.  Hopefully those weekend range trips have kept your skills sharp.

name: Feral Slasher
description: Kill. Maim. Rip. Burn. Tear.

name: Sniper
description: You get paid, then capped people from a kilometer away while hiding.  No one's hiring you now that the world's ended, but your skills may erase some harm before the harm erase you.

name: Genetically Modified Rouge
description: Since you were artificially born and how to use a gun, you get orders, then capped people from some few kilometers away without being seen.  No one's hiring you now that the world's ended, but now you are free... right?

name: Boogeyman
description: You were a killer for hire, trained and equipped to efficiently eliminate your target in various ways.  You kept living like that and will live like that although the world ended.  You'll kill them.  You'll kill them all.

name: Hired Gun
description: Someone contacted you to kill, you answer by killing them.  They don't respond now, but who cares?  They never did before the cataclysm struck anyway.

name: Riot Control Unit
description: The riots were brutal, and that's before the dead rose and started to devour the living.  Soon it became apparent that the line your buddies were holding was about to break - it was only through a bit of luck and a lot of head-bashing that you got away in one piece, and the worst is yet to come.

name: Rookie Police Officer
description: First day on your job and the world ended.  This is not how you imagined your first day...

name: Enforcer
description: You were fighting against an weirdo who bite through your partner's shoulder.  Now that suspect is dead.  Your partner is dead.  Do you feel lucky, survivor?

name: Rivtech Security Service
description: You were the best of the best, the military's finest.  That's why you're still alive, and called the reaper from others, even after all your comrades fell to the undead.  As far as you can tell, military command abandoned you in this hellhole when you missed the emergency evac.  You don't care.  You finish the mission, whatever the cost.

name: Mercenary
description: You were a killer for hire, trained and equipped to efficiently eliminate your target while keeping a low profile.  You are all alone now, but your skills may prove useful for staying alive.

name: Power Armor Soldier
description: Those new plutonium power banks they were rolling out never arrived, nevermind the experimental new weapons, but at least your unit received the latest generation of powered armor.  The rest of your squad has fallen, but your gear might see you through.

name: Quick Response Unit
description: With a siren, you grabbed your humble gear (literally anything) and went to the command center, only finding the place swarming with zombies.  Man, the day is getting worse than you thought.

//: Contains a Behind the Green Tower reference.
name: Sergeant before the day of discharge
description:
You packed your stuff up, bought a booze from the post exchange, and printed the files that you needed.  And your day of discharge is gone.  Forever.
<color_green>"The day before I was discharged from the military, the world is destroyed!  Due to that damned thing, the pain is being transmitted from the back of the brain to the frontal lobe!  Gaaah!!"</color>

name: Military Observer
description: You were an observer - others use some kind of a heavy weapon, and you tell them the target.  Although the people who use those are dead, you still have your gear and the will to survive.

name: Pro Baduk Player
description: Once, you were a pro Baduk player until this cataclysm ended everything that you knew.  You won lots of games, but how will you survive in this hellhole?

name: Gladiator
description: The day when the world ends came, and you grabbed whatever you could get your hands on during a crazy riot - some nets and a forked spear.  Ave Imperator, Morituri te salutant.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'Masked Biker' when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but why do you need to stop helping other people?

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'Ghost User' when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but you grabbed your fist and stand proud.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'speedster' when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but you’re ready for some pre-emptive vengeance.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'space soldier' when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but you still try to find the holy globules.  Praise the space king!

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'mad protagonist' when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but you still try survive.  Somewhere in Nevada...

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'middle-aged hacker' when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but you still try to control the damn thing.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'spectre' when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but you get dirty and the world stays clean.  That's the mission.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'spec ops' from 'Full Strife' series when the world ended.  The world is doomed, FOXTROT UNIFORM.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'researcher' from 'Full Strife' series when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but the right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as an 'engineer' from 'Dread Spruce' series when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but who cares, you quit trying to make sense of it all back on the day 1.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'master chief' from 'Starbind' series when the world ended.  As the original character did, you gotta finish this fight.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'scavenger' from 'Mortal Syndicate' series when the world ended.  The world is doomed, but make yourself at home.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'sensei' from 'galactic warfare' series when the world ended.  May the force be with you.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'staff' from 'Cephalopoda recreation' when the world ended.  Do you still trust people?

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'medium staff' from 'Cephalopoda recreation' when the world ended.  Living is no fun, is it?

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'top staff' from 'Cephalopoda recreation' when the world ended.  Life is short.

name: Cosplayer
description: You cosplayed as a 'player' from 'Cephalopoda recreation' when the world ended.  Is our world any better than this?
You used to be a person wearing a bunny outfit before the Cataclysm, and now that is the only thing you've got.

name: Park Ranger
description: You once protected the wilderness from careless hikers and wildfires—now, you navigate the untamed ruins, tracking the undead like predators, the forest as your last sanctuary.

name: Nobody
description: You were a killer for hire, who planned to buy a castle for you and your dog.  No one's hiring now that the world's ended, but your skills [and your beloved dog, of course] may prove useful for staying alive.  At least it will be easier to find and live in a castle now.
